sentence.text: The House of Windsor has become highly adept at the business of its own survival .
Some suppliers ' representatives are highly adept at pressurising junior staff into placing orders .

At the age of fourteen , Alexei Gismondi was hardly adept at self-revelation .

John Denver was adept at metal work and could earn : 7s. : 6d. for making powder cans .
